description: Slow cooking this beef stroganoff makes it a more economical dish with tender braising beef instead of more expensive fillet.
name: Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mushrooms and creme fraiche, stir well, cover and cook for 1 more hour, adding more water if necessary. Serve with fresh parsley.
